snippet: Manager Tony La Russa criticized the accuracy of the plot — that the 2002 A’s won 103 games and the A.L. West title largely because of sabermetrics.
lead_paragraph: Manager Tony La Russa criticized the accuracy of the plot — that the 2002 A’s won 103 games and the A.L. West title largely because of sabermetrics.

headline.main: La Russa’s Review? ‘Moneyball’ Is Off Base
headline.print_headline: La Russa’s Review? ‘Moneyball’ Is Off Base
headline.seo: La Russa Disagrees With Emphasis of “Moneyball”
